author: CodeCorner

changelog.release_notes:
Removed the second handle and made watchface redraw only once a minute to save battery.
Removed the battery-bar and replaced it with a low battery warning in top right corner instead.
Made hande-shadow darker to match 1.7 graphics better.
Reworked the graphics and made it bigger and bolder

Fixed color of shadows to match new backdrop (Version 1.5)
Made minute handle flow instead of snap to minutes
Edited card back details to match 12, 3, 6, 9 positions and removed the numbers
Updated the background to look more like the original cardback

description:
This is a watchface for you Hearthstone fans out there!

A beautiful analog watch that maybe helps you draw a bit better than you usually do? It features a date-display and a battery meter.

Battery warning at < 20%
